page.title: 17School Camp,Mundesley,1985
page.content: tents,we had a look around the camp and then Mr Richards took us for a walk around Mundesley and on to the beach.Then we went back to camp for our tea.After tea our school went down to the park to play rounders with Mr Richards. When we went back to camp we were shown how to make our beds using our sleeping bags and the groundsheet and two blankets belonging to the camp.We went to bed at about a quarter to ten but because we were so excited and because the ground was quite hard it took ages to get to sleep.The next day a teacher told us that some of the children were still awake and talking at one o'clock in the morning,and that everyone woke up again at five o'clock in the morning because it was so light. Every morning when we woke up we had
